TopicTitle: How Did You Name Your Space Company/Corporation/Industry?

Articles.Content: Mine's expresses the spirit of the enterprise:
I'm Comrade Goat because I have the safety conscious approach of the old Soviet space industry and have been told I'm a mountain goat.
Space Research Bureau. S.R.B. in short

DAA Aerospace

Dan (me) and Adele (my wife) Aerospace. Keeps the wife happy to let her know that I think of her in all my stuff...

Mine's The Kerbal Republic!

Victory through unity, loyalty until death!

I even made/edited a flag for it

Can anyone give me good names for rockets, I like names that start with X,Y and Z and are weapons, for example, Xiphi, Yatagan, Xyston, Zweihander

My flag is just my name.
I guess I'm boring my save file is simply named Diana, and I call my stuff Moon Goddess Industries.

B.I.S.A.

Bacon Intergalatic Space Administration

my first viewer on my livestreams was bacondestructor and things escilated.

Zepto Labs

Pico Space Program

Prefixes for small stuff.

Zepto Labs is special. I coined the name about 5 years ago, for a test website I made for playing around with HTML. I thought is was unique until I discovered Zeptolab 2 years later.
Disarming Baton Space Agency, (so original!) and the flag can be seen underneath my name.
I called my corporation Bagel, because I couldn't think of a good name and I was eating a bagel at the time.
most of the time i use the massively clever name of "default"

Goldham Industries or Goldham Aerospace and Rocketry Divison

Still need a flag of a

Golden Ham with some Rockets and Stuff
Absurd industries founded 1 hour ago...

I named mine The Imperium of Kerman. We follow our brave and fearless leader, the Immortal Emperor of Kerbal Kind, Jebediah. We shall purge the xenos filth from the galaxy..if there were any. Oh well, Jebs got something else for us to blow up.

Mine right now is KSEA which stands for Kerbal Space Exploration Administration.

But I might change it if I come up with a more original name. I really want it to sound like something you'd heard on the news. Like, oh I don't know.... NASA? Something like that maybe.
IHRFSIUNGIS. Standing for; I-hate-rocket-fuel-so-I-use-nitroglycerin-instead. Things usually don't go so well. Death count: 379.
ÃËœÃÂ½Ã‘â€šÃÂµÃ‘â‚¬ÃÂºÃÂ¾Ã‘ÂÃÂ¼ÃÂ¾Ã‘Â is THE obvious name for a space agency,tough mine is under supervision of Kim Yong Un! :-)
NASA-National Aligator Space Agency

Gryphon Orbital

i like gryphons, i orbit things

acronym is GO

wheeee

Mine is Faalskie Co.

It's supposedly Danish, providing the crew with delicious pastries for life support.
Mine is my first name, middle name and surname. I call it The CST Prototype Space Program
Still not really thinking about it. At least seriously. Might try "Kerbal International Ship Porn". But, Donno how well it would be recieved by the Kerbals.
I'm still strying to decide on a name myself...
I call mine AdvScienceIndustries. I've kind of started doing a youtube series, but it's kind of crappy so far (working on it!), not worth linking.
